message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.

I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $16,000 is still a bit higher than what I can afford. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product.  This is a fair price, considering the value you place on it and what I can realistically pay.
